title: You Know When You Have to Carry as a Support Without Gold
body:
http://i.imgur.com/kVQj0eI.jpg

You start off with a working balanced system every time the match starts. The moment your allies enter the lane, they fk everything up. 10mins in, despite ADC who fails to last hit keeps threatening you that they'll afk if you even so try to take 1 CS even if you have {{item:3302}} or {{item:3097}}, they expect you to fix all their mess. 

If your team could just play standard in low ELO, it wouldn't be so bad. Sadly, standard in low ELO means 10 deaths in 10 mins.

Filthy ADC mains can downvote me all you want, but it won't help your KDA.

http://i.imgur.com/07dI9aI.png

Get rekt'd 8deaths avg ADCs.

replies.body:
As a Leona main...

Kill. Kill everything. Do not stop killing. Do not pass go. Do not collect $200. Just kill the entire enemy team. That is how you win.
{{champion:240}} ... ... I think I'm in lo... wait... no, she forgot to kill the ally team.
{{champion:223}} The river troll got your back buddy
The ADC meta should die, make bottom a kill lane with two champions that combo well together instead of a regular support and a marksman, like new Galio and Nunu doin' an ult wombo combo.
lol now you're thinking. {{champion:157}} {{champion:44}} bot is how i got diamond. this guy knows what's up.

I'd rather see {{champion:157}} and {{champion:61}} 

The wombo on wombo on wombo
I would love to see {{champion:412}} + {{champion:122}} or {{champion:267}} + {{champion:120}} instead of fucking  Jhin and Karma every game.

Well you are playing Leona who is quite garbage at doing anything but engage and then be a walking meatshield. In a meta where there is either a Janna or a mage bot wich both ruin the adc meaning your adc either lets you die cause you engaged a Jhin while the enemy Zyra activated her ult or he goes and and is alone cause the Janna blew you away .So it´s not the ads fault that he dies it`s his support selfish desire to pick sunbimbo instead of a support wich can actually do something for him in lane. Why even play Leona there are far better options. Is it cause you like the sun? Just become a homeless man so you can have the sun all day on your face. Might aswell start going Teemo support when you take any option other than Taric as your support. Why not just play Taric he is everything you want and much more.

> [{quoted}](name=no to toxic,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ohbE84Ev,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-03-14T19:18:06.679+0000)

Why even play Leona there are far better options. Is it cause you like the sun? Just become a homeless man so you can have the sun all day on your face. Might aswell start going Teemo support when you take any option other than Taric as your support. Why not just play Taric he is everything you want and much more.

In low elo Leona is fantastic! The ability to choose fights is a powerful tool. In addition, many jannas will fail to interrupt your zenith blade with their whirlwind because they lack the mechanics. I make leona work in plat depending on the matchup (against soraka, karma, lulu, jinx, ashe, jhin... low mobility squishies).

Sorry I'm too lazy to imgur my leona stats, but here they are as per op.gg on 3/14/17. OP your KDA is way better than mine! Also your win percentage is great for 57 games played. Keep it up!	
Leona
45.4 CS
4.50:1 KDA
2.7 / 3.5 / 13.0
63% win rate
27 Played

4.5 KDA isn't bad. To me, that means you're below your real ELO. I made an essay on that a year ago or so in the GD section arguing why people with less than 3.0KDA are in their real ELO and why those with more should get higher if they're performing that on their main. Keep it up yourself and you should rise.

> [{quoted}](name=Sky of Smiles,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ohbE84Ev,comment-id=000400010000,timestamp=2017-03-15T14:18:33.508+0000)

Thank you! Diamond is my goal. Been playing for a few years, and I need to get better to earn it. Good luck in your climb!

There are tricks with Leona Support that I've never seen anybody else been able to pull off.
The trick is to just get a penta

> standard in low ELO means 10 deaths in 10 mins.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}  That's why its easy to climb... u just have to be a bit less bad

Nice kda btw... u just need to have a better kill participation.

I played as Naut with a Varus that was a an utter %%%%. I was dying a few times because I was trying to set up kills for the bastard wasn't he didn't  help me. So I left the punk in bot lane as it was more or less lust and i needed to help up my other mates and did MUCH better.

And ADC much realise that they have a responsibility to not fail their supports when they are setting up kills regardless if it being risky or not. fail to do that and I see no issue with a support abandoning their lane to help theirs because they are fucking shit of their toxic bullshit.
